Headline: #51 51st Temporary Reroute at 51st/Paulina
ShortDescription: 51 51st  buses are temporarily rerouted via 51st, Damen, 55th, Ashland and 51st: due to, street blockage near 51st/Paulina.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#51 51st  buses are temporarily rerouted via 51st, Damen, 55th, Ashland and 51st: due to, street blockage near 51st/Paulina.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays and following earlier track switching problems near Addison. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following earlier track switching problems near Addison.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
